title: Uncial 1
description: Uncial 1 contains parts of the Gospel of Matthew and is dated paleographically to the early 4th century.
location: St. Catherine's Monastery, Sinai Peninsula (Codex Sinaiticus)

title: Uncial 2
description: Uncial 2 features sections of the Gospel of Mark. It is dated to the mid-4th century based on handwriting analysis.

title: Uncial 3
description: Uncial 3 includes passages from the Gospel of Luke. Paleographic analysis suggests it originates from the late 4th century.
location: Alexandria (likely origin), now in the British Library, London (Codex Alexandrinus)

title: Uncial 4
description: Uncial 4 contains excerpts from the Gospel of John, dated paleographically to the late 4th or early 5th century.
location: Constantinople (now in the Biblioth√®que nationale de France, Paris) (Codex Ephraemi Rescriptus)

title: Uncial 5
description: Uncial 5 features parts of the Acts of the Apostles. Handwriting analysis dates it to the early 5th century.
location: Monastery of St. Irenaeus, Lyon (now in the University of Cambridge) (Codex Bezae)

title: Uncial 6
description: Uncial 6 includes portions of the Epistle to the Romans, dated paleographically to the mid-5th century.

title: Uncial 7
description: Uncial 7 contains text from the First Epistle to the Corinthians. Paleographic dating places it in the late 5th century.
location: Monastery of St. Catherine, Sinai Peninsula (Codex Petropolitanus Purpureus)

title: Uncial 8
description: Uncial 8 features sections of the Epistle to the Galatians. It is dated to the late 5th or early 6th century based on handwriting analysis.

title: Uncial 9
description: Uncial 9 includes passages from the Epistle to the Ephesians, paleographically dated to the early 6th century.
location: Great Lavra Monastery, Mount Athos (Codex Coislinianus)

title: Uncial 10
description: Uncial 10 contains parts of the Epistle to the Philippians, dated by handwriting analysis to the mid-6th century.
location: Unknown, now in the British Library (Codex Harleianus)

title: Uncial 11
description: Uncial 11 features portions of the Epistle to the Colossians, dated paleographically to the late 6th century.

title: Uncial 12
description: Uncial 12 includes text from the First Epistle to the Thessalonians, dated to the early 7th century based on handwriting analysis.

title: Uncial 13
description: Uncial 13 contains parts of the Second Epistle to the Thessalonians, paleographically dated to the mid-7th century.

title: Uncial 14
description: Uncial 14 features sections of the First Epistle to Timothy, dated to the mid-7th century based on handwriting analysis.

title: Uncial 15
description: Uncial 15 includes passages from the Second Epistle to Timothy, paleographically dated to the late 7th century.

title: Uncial 16
description: Uncial 16 contains text from the Epistle to Titus, dated by handwriting analysis to the early 8th century.

title: Uncial 17
description: Uncial 17 features parts of the Epistle to Philemon, paleographically dated to the mid-8th century.

title: Uncial 18
description: Uncial 18 includes portions of the Epistle to the Hebrews, dated to the mid-8th century based on handwriting analysis.

title: Uncial 19
description: Uncial 19 contains text from the Epistle of James, paleographically dated to the late 8th century.

title: Uncial 20
description: Uncial 20 features sections of the First Epistle of Peter, dated by handwriting analysis to the early 9th century.

title: Uncial 21
description: Uncial 21 includes passages from the Second Epistle of Peter, paleographically dated to the mid-9th century.

title: Uncial 22
description: Uncial 22 contains text from the First Epistle of John, dated by handwriting analysis to the late 9th century.

title: Uncial 23
description: Uncial 23 features sections of the Second Epistle of John, paleographically dated to the early 10th century.

title: Uncial 24
description: Uncial 24 includes portions of the Third Epistle of John, dated to the mid-10th century based on handwriting analysis.

title: Uncial 25
description: Uncial 25 contains text from the Epistle of Jude, paleographically dated to the late 10th century.

title: Uncial 26
description: Uncial 26 features parts of the Book of Revelation, dated by handwriting analysis to the early 11th century.

title: Uncial 27
description: Uncial 27 includes passages from the Gospel of Matthew, paleographically dated to the mid-11th century.

title: Uncial 28
description: Uncial 28 contains text from the Gospel of Mark, dated by handwriting analysis to the late 11th century.

title: Uncial 29
description: Uncial 29 features sections of the Gospel of Luke, paleographically dated to the early 12th century.

title: Uncial 30
description: Uncial 30 includes portions of the Gospel of John, dated to the mid-12th century based on handwriting analysis.

title: Uncial 31
description: Contains portions of the Gospels, dated to the 6th century

title: Uncial 32
description: Contains portions of the Gospels, significant variations, dated to the 4th/5th century.

description: Contains portions of the New Testament

description: Contains portions of the Gospels
